alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL GULF AND WEST CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 501 PM EDT/401 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Wewahitchka, or 13 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Highland View, Eleven Mile, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, White City, Milltown, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Dalkeith, and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf
